title: Test Drive Unlimited 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Chase glory from behind the wheel of the most exclusive performance cars and take the race online to challenge rivals around the world. Customise your life as you tear through the streets and kick up dust off - road on the sun - kissed islands of Ibiza and Hawaii.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: TDU 2: Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport Sang Bleu
childDownloads.description: The Sang Bleu was commissioned to honor the 100th anniversary of the Bugatti marquee. It features blue carbon fibre with polished aluminum. The rims are inspired by the Grand Sport Roadster and highlighted in a midnight blue with a diamond cut two-tone finish. The interior is trimmed in newly developed Gaucho leather. An exclusive leather jacket for your avatar is also provided with this model.

childDownloads.title: TDU 2: Caterham Superlight R500
childDownloads.description: Stripped to the bare essentials, all unnecessary comforts are removed to save weight and reduce mass. The original R500 was legendary, with the old Rover K-series powered machine rewriting performance records for 0-60mph and 0-100-0mph times. This new variant has been equipped to supersede its predecessor by embracing the very latest in lightweight engineering techniques and technology. If you want a pure driver’s car that delivers blistering on-road performance, raw driving thrills and outrageous track-day ability in equal measure then the Superlight R500 is for you. Hold on tight. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer.

childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2: Chevrolet Camaro Synergy Special Edition
childDownloads.description: The Synergy Green exterior color is accented by Cyber Grey Rally Stripes. The color scheme is mirrored on the interior, with Synergy Green instrument panel and door inserts. Synergy Green stitching also accents the Jet Black cloth seats, steering wheel, shift knob and center console.  An exclusive leather jacket for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: TDU 2: Ferrari 599 GTB Fiorano China Edition
childDownloads.description: Specifically created for the Chinese market this model features an exclusive porcelain paint color, an exclusive leather interior and a redesigned dashboard. An exclusive leather jacket for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: TDU 2: Ferrari 612 Sessanta
childDownloads.description: The car is capable of speeds up to 196 mph and can reach 60 mph in just 4.2 seconds. This grand tourer is unique as a true 4 seater with adequate space in the rear seats for two adults. Only sixty of these rare masterpieces were built (60 units) to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the company. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer.

childDownloads.title: TDU 2:Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Super Sport
childDownloads.description: This supercar has been clocked as one of the fastest production vehicles in the world, setting a previous street record at 267.86mph. The Supersport packs an impressive 1200 HP that can launch this fireball from 0 to 60 in 2.2 seconds. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer.

childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2: 15 Car Bundle
childDownloads.description: This special offer delivers all 15 cars released prior to DLC2 at a special low price.  If you're looking to access all the content in the game, this is the best value to complete your collection (now you just need that 15 car garage!). Bundle includes Audi Q7 V12 TDI Quattro, Audi RS 5 Coupé, Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Centenaire, Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport Sang Bleu, Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Super Sport, Chevrolet Camaro Synergy Special Edition, Ford Shelby GT500. Aston Martin DBS Carbon Black,Aston Martin V12 Vantage Black, Ferrari 599 GTB Fiorano China Edition, Ferrari 612 Sessanta, Jaguar XKR Speed Pack and Black Pack,  Pagani Zonda Tricolore,Caterham Superlight R500 and Nissan 370Z. Cars Sold Separately!

childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2: Britian/Italy Bundle
childDownloads.description: This special offer delivers SEVEN of the finest vehicles produced in Great Britain and Italy, including premier manufacturers like Ferrari, Aston Martin, and Jaguar.Car bundle includes previously released cars, Aston Marton DBS Carbon Black,Aston Martin V12 Vantage Black, Ferrari 599 GTB Fiorano China Edition, Ferrari 612 Sessanta, Jaguar XKR Speed Pack and Black Pack,  Pagani Zonda Tricolore,Caterham Superlight R500  Cars Sold Separately!

childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2: Europe/US 7 Car Bundle
childDownloads.description: This special offer delivers SEVEN of the finest vehicles produced in the US and on the Continent, including premier manufacturers like Bugatti, Audi, and Shelby. .Car pack includes previously released cars, Audi Q7 V12 TDI Quattro, Audi RS 5 Coupé, Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Centenaire, Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport Sang Bleu, Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Super Sport, Chevrolet Camaro Synergy Special Edition, Ford Shelby GT500. Cars Sold Separately!

childDownloads.title: TDU2 Audi RS 5 Coupé
childDownloads.description: Tremendous power packaged in a classically elegant coupe body: Audi introduces the Audi RS 5 Coupé. The high-revving 4.2 liter V8 delivers 331 kW (450 hp), yet is amazingly fuel efficient. The seven-speed S tronic and an innovative center differential in the quattro drivetrain transmits power to all four wheels. Developed by quattro GmbH, the Audi RS models is the spearhead of the Audi model range. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer.

childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2: Casino Online
childDownloads.description: Test your luck on Roulette and several different types of Slot machines. Confront other players at Poker Texas Hold’em and participate in tournaments. Be the best driver on the Casino Island races! Compete to unlock TWO EXCLUSIVE CARS: an Audi R8 Spyder 5.2 FSI quattro and a Spyker C8 Aileron Spyder. Win other exclusive prizes: furniture for your house, stickers for your car and clothes for your avatar. This game gives access to 10 new levels of progression. You must have an online account to play. Up to 32 players all together. HDD space required: 250 MB.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Chevrolet Corvette ZR1
childDownloads.description: The Corvette ZR1 is the ultimate version of the C6. The many technical innovations it has helped make its conduct more accessible and efficient, particularly on circuit courses.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Dodge Viper SRT10 ACR
childDownloads.description: The SRT10 ACR version of the famous Viper will please the lovers of circuit courses, thanks to a "race" preparation in proper form. Specific aerodynamic attributes, weight saved, improved  braking and shock absorbers make it a true race car approved for the road!

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Ducati Desmosedici RR
childDownloads.description: Ducati offers, with the Desmosedici RR, to realize the dream of owning a GP motorcycle replica. Its non-standard technical features make it an exclusive motorcycle with unbelievable performance!

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Ducati Diavel Carbon
childDownloads.description: Power and style have never been combined with such precision. Its breathtaking aesthetic, its unexpected agility and its brutal engine make the Diavel an exclusive motorcycle, both exuberant and elegant.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Ferrari 250 GTO
childDownloads.description: The Ferrari 250 GTO is widely considered as the best of the Ferrari models, and one of the most famous sports cars of all time. Beyond its fantastic sports awards, the GTO became legendary for its sophisticated suspension and its aesthetic.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Ferrari 599 XX
childDownloads.description: The Ferrari 599XX is the ultimate version of the Ferrari 599 GTB Fiorano. Only 30 copies of this car were produced. This aggressive prototype, whose body was carried out in composite materials and carbon fiber inherits from a V12 6.0 with 700 HP at 9,000 rpm.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Ferrari F40
childDownloads.description: For the 40 years anniversary of the Ferrari brand, Enzo Ferrari decided to build the most powerful and effective series-produced car of all time: The F40! Superb, powerful, magical, the F40 is definitely an automobile born for circuit and race.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Ford Shelby GT500
childDownloads.description: The rebirth of a legend, this reinvented Shelby delivers classically inspired styling and a supercharged engine. The rear-wheel-drive Ford Shelby GT500 is one of the all-time greatest muscle cars ever to hit the pavement. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Harley Davidson Fatboy Lo
childDownloads.description: The Fat Boy is certainly one of the most iconic models of the Harley-Davidson range. 20 years after its appearance, the Fat Boy Lo appears in 2010, in its superb black hue where the shining mixes skillfully with dull colours.

childDownloads.title: TDU2 Inuit Edition Audi Q7 V12 TDI quattro
childDownloads.description: This model features an exclusive and unique paint job. An exclusive shirt for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Jaguar XKR Speed Pack and Black Pack
childDownloads.description: The XKR speed pack increases maximum speed from 155 mph to an awe-inspiring 174 mph. In addition, the Black Pack is a sleek, black custom package that includes a unique, aerodynamic body kit with front splitter and larger rear spoiler, body colored rear signature blade and diffuser, side sill extensions, gloss black front grilles, air intakes and 20” Kalimnos gloss black alloy wheels. An “XKR” side graphic has also been added. An exclusive shirt for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2 - Mandatory 4
childDownloads.description: Force Feedback enhancement – The power and reaction time of force feedback response has been improved.   Stickers Update – An update to the sticker board system will ensure that the correct stickers options are available to all users.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Mercedes-Benz SL65 AMG Black Series
childDownloads.description: Athletic, an evil V12, breathtaking performances , and most of all a philosophy focused exclusively on sport and on the practice on circuit make the SL65 AMG Black Series an outstanding road car.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Nissan 370Z Optional Parts
childDownloads.description: A bright yellow 370Z with big, black graphics. Taking design cues from Nissan’s European GT4 Series cars, the Yellow gets the aforementioned colour scheme and graphics together with a set of 19″Rays Alloys. The inside is all black leather and Alcantara. An exclusive shirt for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: TDU2: Pagani Zonda Tricolore
childDownloads.description: The Pagani Zonda Tricolore is produced in extremely limited numbers. The interior features specific blue and white leather and an exclusive blue dashboard. An exclusive pullover for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: TDU2:Aston Martin V12 Vantage Carbon Black Edition
childDownloads.description: For the V12 Vantage the iconic Aston Martin side strake has been fashioned from real carbon fibrebacked by a black mesh and complimented with gloss black 10 spoke diamond turned alloy wheels. Lightweight seats formed from carbon fibreand kevlaralso feature together with piano black faciatrim, centre stack and centre console. It also has anodisedblack tread plates and unique sill plaques build on the carbon theme. A dedicated jacket for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

childDownloads.title: TDU2:Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Centenaire
childDownloads.description: This model features black carbon fibre with polished aluminium with unique rims which were inspired by the historical Bugatti models. The interior has both a new and unique colour combination and the addition of a logo. An exclusive shirt for your avatar is also provided with this model. Pick up this car in the Used Car dealer. The item of clothing will be available in your dressing room.

Chase glory from behind the wheel of the most exclusive performance cars and take the race online to challenge rivals around the world. childDownloads.title: Test Drive Unlimited 2: Trailer 1 World Of TDU2
childDownloads.description: Get an inside look into the world of Test Drive Unlimited 2 in this sun-soaked trailer.
